 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחַק‎</span>] **verb** ==rub away, beat fine, pulverize== (so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***worn garment, thin clouds***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁחַק‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pilverize***; Ecclus <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שחק‎</span> [[Eccl.6.36|Eccl 6:36]] is ***go often*** (wear by treading), [[BDB#Str|Str]] compare ***iter terere***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲבָּנִים שָֽׁחֲקוּ מַיִם‎</span> [[Job.14.19|Job 14:19]] ***waters rub away stones***; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁחַקְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Exod.30.36|Exod 30:36]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; of pulverizing incense, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דקק‎</span> **Hiph\`il**); figurative, accusative of foes, ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֶשְׁחָקֵם‎</span> [[2Sam.22.43|2Sam 22:43]] (\|\|) = [[Ps.18.43|Ps 18:43]].
